page.title: 07SURVEY ON OUR HOMES.
page.content: Third year children undertook a survey to discover what houses we lived in and what they were like. TYPES OF HOUSES LIVED IN. PER CENT {Detached Houses 23% {Semi-detached Houses 48% {Terraced Houses 16% {Bungalows 13% We were not surprised to find that nobody lived in flats because you normally find them in cities and not towns like Sheringham. We also did a survey on houses' ages {Built before 1850 13% {Built between 1850 and 1918 13% {" " 1918 and 1939 13% { " " 1945 and 1975 25% } {Built since 1975 15% Some people (21%) could not find out how old their houses were. 42% were built of red brick, 58% of flint, rough cast or painted brick.
